title: The Adventures of Adam Raccoon: Lost Woods
description: Kids will love following Adam Raccoon on his adventures throughout the Master's Wood!  It is a place of natural beauty, with streams, waterfalls, flowering meadows and groves of tall trees. It is also a wild and untamed land where wolves and dangers abound. Fortunately, King Aren watches over and protects Adam and his friends who love to play and explore every corner of Master's Wood.
author: Glen Keane
